description:
This is a market on whether Ethereum's ($ETH) price will sustain a daily change of 10% or more, in terms of relative change in their USD prices, on any day within this market timeframe. The resolution source is https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum/historical_data/usd#panel. 

If the close price of $ETH on any day in May 2022 had a 10% or more unrounded absolute percentage difference from its open price on the same day, the market will resolve to “Yes.” Otherwise, the market will resolve to “No.”

The following example shows how the absolute percentage difference is calculated. If on May 10, the open price of $ETH was $3400, and the close price of $ETH was $3100, the percentage difference would be | ((3100-3400)/(3400)) | * 100 = 8.82%, which would not suffice to resolve the market to “Yes.”

This market's timeframe spans from May 1, 2022 to May 31, 2022 (inclusive). The resolution source will be checked daily after the day's close price is finalized, in addition to checking all the days beforehand. The last check will be once the close price for May 31, 2022 is final and published at the resolution source. If relevant data is unavailable, another source (e.g. CoinMarketCap) will be used.

events.title: Will Ethereum's (ETH) price have a 10% or more daily change on any day in May 2022?

question: Will Ethereum's (ETH) price have a 10% or more daily change on any day in May 2022?
